item.title: The Lab: Docker
item.description: A deep dive into some common Docker misconfigurations, exploitations, etc. for learning and reference purposes, using a Ubuntu Server VM called “lab”. Disclaimer: I’m not a Docker expert, these are just some notes I put together whilst researching Docker security and general usage, for my own interest. The information here is taken from a wide variety of sources. Disclaimer for the disclaimer: That’s smart talk for “I just wanted to f*ck about with Docker”.
